name: Ø Ø Ø (Aevi)
description:
Ø Ø Ø is a game about Music and Poetry.

Explore three different Islands, share your thoughts with the sages of your dreamscapes and get lost in the psychedelic visuals; why not just stay a while and listen?

Use WASD to move, Space to jump and the Mouse to look around!

Credits:

Mylene Ben Osman

Anna Margrét Jónudóttir

Gereon Plättner

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
